title: NFL Week 17 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 1/1)
description:
Will Brinson, Pete Prisco, R.J. White and Kenny White link up to offer their Best Bets for Week 17 of the NFL season.
Steelers-Browns
Washington-Eagles
Titans-Texans
Jets-Patriots
Seahawks-49ers
Raiders-Broncos
Cardinals-Rams
Dolphins-Bills
Vikings-Lions
Chargers-Chiefs
Cowboys-Giants

Jaguars-Colts
Falcons-Bucs
